name: Command & Conquer: Red Alert 2

script.exe: drive_c/Program Files/EA Games/Command & Conquer Die ersten 10 Jahre/Command & Conquer Red Alert(tm) II/AR2/Ra2.exe

content:
exe: drive_c/Program Files/EA Games/Command & Conquer Die ersten 10 Jahre/Command
  & Conquer Red Alert(tm) II/AR2/Ra2.exe
game:
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: setup.exe
- task:
    executable: $DISC/setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
